entra A y sale en B
0 => "000000000001101111111111",
1 => "011110000001111000000000",
2 => "011011111111111000000000",
3 => "000001111000111000000000",
4 => "011110000111100000000000",
5 => "010110000001111000000000",
6 => "011000000001111000000000",
7 => "111010000001011000000000"

suma A + 3
0 => "000000000001101111111100",
1 => "011110000001111000000011",
2 => "011011111111111000000011",
3 => "000001111000111000000011",
4 => "011110000111100000000011",
5 => "010110000001111000000011",
6 => "011000000001111000000011",
7 => "111010000001011000000011"

resta A - 3
0 => "000000000001101111101100",
1 => "011110000001111000010011",
2 => "011011111111111000010011",
3 => "000001111000111000010011",
4 => "011110000111100000010011",
5 => "010110000001111000010011",
6 => "011000000001111000010011",
7 => "111010000001011000010011"
